page.title: 16Education In Norton Area.
page.content: {Stockton Norton C.E.P. Controlled {School}is very old because my friend's dad used to come to school here. We have 2 teachers, and 30 primary children in school now. Children start school here in the term when they become 5, and transfer to The Endowed Comprehensive School, Bridgnorth when they are 11. The school is in Stockton Parish, and has the old building, a demountable classroom, a playground and the use of the large School Field. Dinners are cooked and eaten at The Village Hall. {Cotsbrook Community School}is a part of Bryn Alyn Community, Wrexham, Clwyd. There are 60 residential places for secondary children. It is a Special Education Boarding School for Children in Care.
